job_purpose: To drive the company forward by writing great software, applying world-class software engineering principles, and mentoring other software engineers.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Own and deliver on company-wide multi-year and multi-team goals
Influence, build relationships, and manage differing viewpoints
Partner with peers and Heads of Engineering to define product vision and technical strategy
Mentor and develop other engineers into software engineering best practices
required_qualifications: Experience in a large complex enterprise company in Australia or New Zealand
Proven track record of delivering successful software
Ability to mentor other software engineers
Passionate about delivering excellent code and helping others do the same
company_details: Upper Echelon is a world-class global company offering a high-performing team environment with opportunities for career progression, complex challenges, and mentorship. The company values delivering excellent solutions and invests in its teams for success. The role offers a negotiable salary of between $220,000 to $250,000 per year plus benefits, with potential for growth into leadership positions.
